title: VIRTUAL REALITY LAB NY - DEMO SPLASH
desc:
Join us at Samsung Studio in Soho for eats, drinks and cool VR demos! 
 Experience 15+ virtual reality demos made in New York City's inaugural Virtual Reality Lab. Demos include immersive journalism, films, games, virtual museums and even a pop-up book. In addition, the Economist Lab will be presenting the VR demo "RecoVR: Mosul." 
 Gear VR, Oculus Rifts and Cardboard on hand. For more info on demos, visit:  http://timewavefestival.com/index.php/autumn-vr-lab-projects/ 
 In partnership with Samsung Global Innovation Center, NYC Media Lab and NYVR, LoNyLa/TimeWave has launched Virtual Reality Lab NY, which combines VR development sessions, a public demo and NYC Media Lab?s autumn conference on VR. The goal: to provide media creators and technologists with an opportunity to create VR/AR/MR prototypes, explore complex formats using immersive technology, and collaborate with like-minded members of the VR community.
